You put the remote in your pocket and began to take the new TV to your place. You were just to be careful not to ruin this one. With effort, you manage to set the TV perfectly in the room. You plugged it in and turned it on. It works!

"Why would anyone just throw this away?" you asked yourself. You searched through the channels, like always, there doesn't seem to be anything good on. After a minute of searching you just decided to leave it on.......

111111.content:
The hunger hits you like a frieght train, you fall to your knees in front of the fridge in unfathomable agony. The sudden jolt subsides but is replaced by what feels like pirahna in your stomach trying to eat you from the inside out.

Thats when you spot it, a chocolate cake unlike any youve ever seen. A light shade of thick brown butter icing coating every inch of it, with dark brown chocolate royal icing decorating it, it was easily enough to feed 20 people even if they went for sconds and thirds, yet it sat their in a way that bafflingly did not crowd your small sized fride

You didn't even fight it before you reached in and yanked it and dumped the entire massive plate on the floor, and without thinking grabbed at it and started shoveling it in your mouth like a toddler.

God it was good, you had never tasted anything so rich and chocolatly. The richness stuck in your mouth though, which was why you reached into the fridge and grabbed a mouth several liter bottle of full fat buttermilk and chugged at it before digging back into the moist gooey delight.

A mere 3 minutes later you pulled yourself out of the plate where the cke had been, literally licked clean of any chocolate at all. The cartoon had not a drop left inside.

You sat back and rubbed your distended stomach, unbelieving you had just pigged out like that. You go to stand back up when you here a creepily familiar voice on your tv in the living room.

"It all started one day when I just walked inta the kitchen and ate everything in it. I couldn't stop myself, I just ate and ate and ate till every goody in the house was gone."

The hunger returned stronger than ever, you dove for the fridge.

1111112.content:
It vanishes like like water down the drain.

Food to feed a family just disappears down your gullet with barely any time to chew or swallow. You consumed a wheel of cheese in 5 seconds flat before licking clean a bowl of butter frosting in 7. If you were being timed pro speed eaters would be crying about how they wasted their life by now.

Cupboard doors were lying behind you after you tore them of the hinges to get to the food behind them. Cartons and containers in pieces as you were to desperate for their contents to open them like a human being. Anything that didn't involve you eating at the moment was beyond you.....well eating and listening to the voice from the TV in the next room as it shaped you into it's doughy image.

“After that day it never stopped. No matter how much I ate I was still hungry. I could at for hours and still feel like I hadn't eaten one bite.”

'Hours!' You thought miserably while pouring Nachos into your mouth and chasing it with dipping cheese.

This time a female voice, the Interviewer chimed in.

“Hours!? Sorry, but I find that hard to believe even with your immense size how is it you could eat that much and not rupture your stomach.”

You though you heard a loud slapping noise, a gut feeling telling you that’s the sound your belly f will make when you shrug your shoulders and lift the flaps slightly.

“I have the best digestion in the world. Everything I eat gets stored as fat.....I don't make any waste.”

No waste? Wait did that guy on the TV you dreaded was your future self saying that he didn't need to.”

“You store...'everything' as fat? Your honestly telling me you don't need to go to the bathroom!?”

“Haven't as much as passed gas in a long time.”

The last crumb in the house rolls past your tongue and to brace yourself against the wall. A bubbling in your stomach tells you your about to belch, but as the gas bubble rises in your throat you feel it go back down, the bubbling ceasing.

“No way.” You say with wide eyes...before they literally pop out as you notice just how big you’ve gotten. You were 200 pounds of solid muscle just a short while ago but now you looked like you'd never as much as looked at a gym in your life.

You had no definition to speak of, potato like biceps had been mashed turning it soft and flabby, your huge thighs that you'd gotten from cycling were bigger still and could seat someone comfortably. Your belly touched your lap and spread some, tears clear on your shirt. All in all you looked a good 50 to 60 pounds bigger than before the hunger struck.

Like it did now.

All consuming hunger filled your body again leaving you writhing on the floor as you tried to fight it, tried to fight becoming what the TV said you would become.

“I tried to fight it at first, but I couldn't. I NEEDED TO EAT!!!”

NED TO EAT!!!

NEED TO EAT!!!

NEED TO EAT!!!

“I *ngh* need...to....EAT!!!” You jump up and run for the front door. Grabbing your keys and your wallet. You almost break the door down as you leave your place totally uncaring to the open portal to your home. All you cared about was getting to the nearest source of food.

The Interview continued. Even without its audience.

“I still find it hard to believe. Even with what you tell me about your body I can't believe you got so big in...”

“..I know I know. Two thousand pounds in two weeks is something even I still can't believe.”

You almost come to a screeching halt outside the closet resterant from your house.

L'oie engraissée

This was the place you went to propose to the girl you love. To host large family reunions so you could impress long lost cousins.....

*GROWL*

...To eat as much as physically possible when your possessed by your magic tv.

You rush into the building, barely stopping at the thin stached waiterss podium.

"Ah Mr Smith a delight as always. Your table is ready." He says an escorts you.

"But I *ugh!* didn't call ahead." You manage to mumble out.

The man laughed a little "Ho ho? as if we wouldnot be ever ready for the man who comes to us for lunch every single day."

"But I....." New memories com before you. You did indeed come hear every single day. You always had them lead you to a private dining area because...NO!!!"

The waiter lead you away from the main dining floor into a private room were a massive table, massive chair and massive meal were waiting for you.

"Your usual Monsieur. Everything twice over."

Memories of you sitting there content with a huge amount of plates on either side of you came to mind. There was no way you could e....

*GROAN*

"You came just in time it would seem." He laugherd again along with the other help dotted about the room. "Here let us help you.

"Wha? No! I don't want...!" His words fell on deaf ears as he was practically swooped off his feet and placed in the chair. A napkin tucked under his chin, a spoon in his hand and a bowl of the thickest cheese soup he'd ever seen placed under his nose. He would have resuned denying this extravagent meal if his own hand hadn't betrayed him and started spooning the creamy broth into his mouth.

What followed was him gorging on each and every item placed before him with the highest level of grace and etiquette. Twirling pasta onto a fork and eating it without spilling a drop of sauce. Wolfing down an entire roosted ham without making annoying chewing noises. Drinking glass after glass of soda and wine and milk without getting anywhere but down his throat. Every time he'd finished one item another was placed under his nose.

It was like National Lampoons european vacation where the daughter had a nightmare of getting enormous off of this food, and like her he swore he could feel himself swelling up.

An hour or half that time later he was resting in the seat, a pile of plates surrounding him. The Matre D returned.

"I hope you enjoyed your lunch sir. Now onto the matter of..."

"Oh crap. The bill!?" His pants were tight enough now that he knew he didn't have a waller in them.

"Oh no no no sir thats been covered as usual...."

"It has?" Once again he found himself remembering things he never did. Such as walk back and forth out of hear while never having to pay.

"...I was merely asking you if you were ready for second lunch?" He asked, and sure enough mor people poured into the room, wheeling in carts to put new plates down and carry the old ones away.

You rush to your feet and start to leave "No thanks I'm not h...."

*FEED ME, FEED ME NOW!!!*

You crash back into the seat where yur napkin is replaced and your pushed foward in front of lobster thermador.

"Bon appitite sir." The Matre D said with a somewhat cruel smile.

You reduce the lobster to its shell in less than a minute.

That guy on TV with your exact name.

The deep blue eyes, the strong chin, the ear piercing, the slightly upturned nose turned nose, the...the light scar on your left cheek from when you were twelve and tried to shave the hair off your tongue when you snuck dads whisky and woke up the next day hung over. 'This will keep you safe since you can't protect yourself Eric.' The voice of Laura your neighbour said in a memory from a past event that never happened.

The apartment exploded in size in exact proportion to you. You gazed at your living space while it remodelled itself to match a man of your size, shifting with every pound that piled itself on you.

The wall separating the kitchen from living room vanished. The cooking space itself doubled and tripled in size until it could pass for a restaurant work space. The fridge gained a brother...and a sister....and another brother and another sister all reaching from ceiling to floor and as wide as a sedan.

The TV expanded with every breath you took.....OK this situation wasn't all bad. The couch unfolded into a bed. You'd consider it strange since you didn't own a sofa bed but held your tongue when any traces of it being a sofa vanished and it became an enormously wide four post with the sturdiest frame you ever saw. The mattress looked like you'd fall asleep as soon as you touched it.

NO! This was no time to sleep! You needed to get out of here! Needed to....why was the door getting further away.

No wait your mistake. You were being drawn towards the bed.

Oh hell no.

You thrashed against the invisible force pulling you to ultimate comfort. Trying to grab onto anything you could to no avail, anything you touched simply ceased to exist. Things that a immobile man would have no use for in his home. You flung yourself to the floor to try and grip the carpet but it spontaneously became a hardwood floor your growing belly slide along with some discomfort. In mere moment you were on the bed, the motor on it pushing your mattress up massive quilt that could cover an orca swept up over you.

“Have ta...get...NO I..won....t......zzzzz” You tried to fight it but this bed was like a cloud. You feel asleep as the apartment continued to transform into a house around you, matching your fatness just as you shot past fat and became obese.

Consciousness returned slowly to you, eyelids trying as hard as possible to stay shut. Finally your desire to wake up overrode your desire to sleep and fully opened.

You found yourself looking at the biggest TV you had ever seen. 400 inches of pure HD magic. It was on that 'man vs food' show were that guy toured the country trying all their different eating challenges. You saw him sit down at a table just as someone brought out a leaning tower of burger, 5 patty’s nested between 5 fried buns and covered in cheese and sauce.

Your belly rumbled.

“Hmm...hungry.” You moaned and braced yourself to get up.

You got an inch up then immediately crashed back to bed.

You wake up completely with a jolt, memories of what happened before you slept came rushing back. The TV, the blob on TV that looked just like you, the changing house, the..the swelling up like a balloon. You fear to look down at yourself but do so anyway.

Your breath hitches in your chest. You had become him.

From the massive mountain that was your stomach obscuring anything of yourself beyond it, to the man boobs that if you were a woman would make Pamela Anderson jealous. Your hands with finger like sausages flexed uselessly unable to lift from the massive rolls that obscured most of your arms. You tied to tilt your head but your massive multi chins blocked any attempt t move your neck more than a few inches without bounce back.

“Aww don't worry Eric. Look what I've got.”

To turn your head as best you could towards the familiar voice. It was Lisa!.........holding a plate of bacon and eggs that could feed 20.

Your titanic stomach growled like the orcs of Isengard.

“God you ate right before you went to sleep less than two hours ago and your that hungry already.” She took a knife and jabbed into a fatty bit of glistening bacon. Your mouth began to water uncontrollably.

“It's a damn god thing I'm a big enough freak to find this sexy otherwise I'd find you disgusting.” She smiled lustfully before kissing you, her tongue dancing over yours and bouncing off the inside of your swollen face. “Lucky for you.”

“Now open wide. My babies got to look his best for today.” She said before she started to shovel the fattening goodness into your automatically opening and chewing maw. Feelings of despair and anger at your predicament being stepped on by your unrelenting desire to feed.

“Wads su spcl bout tday?” (What's so special about today) You said between bites, the motion of speaking laboured by your monstrous jowls.

“Remember? We were asked to go on that show to talk about your life since becoming the worlds fattest man? I even had a bigger version of your favourite suit made for today.”

151321111111122212111.title: Go into a fitness show.

1513211111112.content:
Cody found himself right outside of a massive buffet restaurant when he finally came to his senses. Just as he got to his feet and brushed himself off, a green rabbit came outside and welcomed him. "Hey there, stranger! You hungry?" Cody thought for a moment - he could eat, yeah, but he didn't have any money on him, seeing as he wasn't even wearing clothes anymore. "Well, yeah, but I'm broke," the dog said. "No problem," the rabbit said, "I can just bill you later. Come on, I just pulled some fresh dishes out of the oven!" Not wanting to turn down the rabbit's forceful generosity, the mutt wandered into the buffet.

Around him was a wide variety of every possible form of food he could eat, and lots of it. Anything he could imagine was there. "Help yourself, kid, I'll be in the back room," the rabbit said as he walked into the kitchen. Catching a whiff of the food, Cody figured he could go ahead and have a bite, and grabbed a plate.
1513211111112.title: Catdog - "Sumo Enchanted Evening"

choices: 300 pounds, making him look ready for sumo
15132111111121.content:
Cody first grabbed a plate and started to fill it up with burgers, roast beef, steak, pretty much any meat he could see, his new dog identity clearly affecting his tastes. Finding an open seat - which wasn't hard - he sat down and took his first bite out of a sandwich. It was heavenly! He quickly finished it and, in mere minutes, had demolished the first plate. Standing up and looking around, he noticed the place was empty. While that seemed suspect, he thought, it would also allow him to do whatever he wanted as he ate, he figured. Eschewing the plates, he quickly began happily and greedily stuffing himself with whatever he could find, letting the taste of the food put him in a state of bliss.

Of course, the food was so good it was distracting him about a much more pressing issue. After he had finished his first plate, the dog had gained a small pot belly - the buffet had some kind of cartoon effect on it that made it super-fattening. And as Cody freely stuffed himself, that effect on him grew and grew. He finally stopped eating and grabbed a drink of water about half-an-hour later, then patted his sated stomach, only to find out he wasn't quite the size he had been when he walked in the door. Cody had gained...
15132111111121.title: The food is fattening

151321111111212.content:
Cody was stunned when he realized what had happened since he walked in the door. He was skinny just a half-hour ago, but now looked like a balloon of his former self. His belly stretched out feet - plural - and his arms and legs had tripled, possibly more, in size. Moving was different, even - he could feel the weight on his body as he shifted in his seat and even breathed. Worried about what was going on, he started to get up to leave - which proved difficult - when the rabbit came back in to check on him. He had a food dish with wheels on it rolling in front of him.

"Well, someone liked the food, huh? I'm so glad everything was up your alley! Before you go, would you mind trying out a new dessert course I'm developing?" With that, the rabbit opened the tray to the dish, revealing what looked like a three-foot-deep trough of green pudding mixed with graham crackers and whipped cream. "It's my new Key Lime pudding! Won't you take a bite?"

Cody was caught between his mind and his stomach. Every part of him except for his belly wanted out immediately - his belly, meanwhile, had other plans. Could he resist?
151321111111212.title: 300 pounds, making him look ready for sumo

1513211111112122.content:
"I really should go, even though that looks... so delicious...", Cody said, before his rumbling stomach and his drooling mouth cut him off.

"I can see you're still hungry! Tell you what, I'll leave this here and you can try out as much as you want," the rabbit said before walking to a back room. "Bon appetit!"

Cody dipped a finger into the pudding and tasted it, only to discover it was one of the best things he'd ever put in his mouth. A second finger-ful turned into a paw-ful, then the mutt lost all abandon and knelt down, shoving his entire face into the trough. The pudding was absolutely heavenly, so good that he lost himself in the taste and didn't even notice his stomach beginning to bloom out under him again. Over the next hour, he managed to finish the entire thing, even licking the bottom clean, before coming to his senses again. "Oh, no, I didn't," he thought to himself, but oh, yes, he did...
1513211111112122.title: No

It was all a blur to you, but a few short minutes, the Transdogmafier finally releases you, as it's doors opened by themselves and you fell out in the process, landing on the floor. From there, you slowly got your bearings and cautiously stood back up onto your new paw-like feet.

In the reflection, you saw your favorite Road Rovers OC, Sadie the Husky, looking back at you. "Wait a minute; That's my OC, Sadie! But.....why am I looking through her eyes?" You thought to yourself, confused as to what was happening. But then, when you moved your hand and flexed your fingers, Sadie did the same, making you realize a shocking revelation and thought, "Oh my god, I. Am. Sadie."

From what you remember when you created her, Sadie was a female Husky, bearing the same fur colors and pattern as Jenna from Balto, sporting dark brown straight hair that reached down to her hips, with a streak of red hair on the left side of her bangs. As the Transdogmafier started sending shockwaves through your body, you began to feel strange changes overcoming you. Brown and black fur began growing over your body. Your feet started to grow slightly as your nails sharpened into claws, ripping your socks off. They took on a digitigrade stance as the fur spread up your legs. Your hips pushed out as your butt became thicker and more firm. A long, brown and black furry tail elongated from your backside, tearing a hole in your pants. Your face started pushing out into a noticeable canine muzzle. Your nose turned round, black, and wet while your teeth grew slightly sharper. Your new muzzle turned a shade of black as fur covered your face. Your ears grew large and triangular as they moved to the top of your head. Your eyes became wider, with your eyelashes growing out. Your waist squeezed inwards slightly as your whole body grew more toned. Your chest grew heavier as you gained a noticeable bust. Your manhood started to push inwards, until it had reshaped into a female flatness. Your clothes began to combine and change into a form fitting uniform. You let out an involuntary howl as the changes subsided.

Soon, the doors to the Transdogmafier slid open as you fell down to the floor. You slowly came to your feet, still in somewhat of a daze. You caught a glimpse of your reflection in the polished tile floor. You were surprised to see a shapely anthro German Shepherd staring back at you, dressed in a familiar uniform, mimicking your every move. It then dawned on you...

"Oh my god," you said in a much more feminine voice with a slight German accent. "I'm my OC, Tanya!"

You were walking one day and noticed a tv laying on the curb with a free sign on it. You needed a new tv for your room and decide to take it.

You finally get home and hook everything up. It was a lot of work, but you just got a really nice tv for free. You grab the remote and lay down on your bed. As you touch the remote, a small shock courses through your body. You shrug it off as being some glitch from laying outside. You cant believe that it actually still works and everything. You turn on the tv and the first thing you see is a show called, "Drop Dead Diva", the first character you notice on the show is, Kim Caswell, who right now is 9 months pregnant and is a snarky lawyer who is the frenemy of "Jane" the main character. You instantly cant stop watching and cant stop focusing on Kim. You suddenly feel an urge for a big fat juicy burger with jalapenos and chocolate. That was a very strange and sudden craving. But you decided to make it while still watching the show from the kitchen.

As you are cooking, you dont even notice that you have shrunk in height to about 5'5 and didnt notice your hair turning from short brown to long and blonde. Or the fact that your face was changing from a more boyish masculine to a definite feminine one or the loss of muscle and tone to feminine fat. Your chest starts to expand to about a DD with breast milk filling a lot. Your dick slowly recedes and becomes a brand new vagina. Finally, an embryo is slowly starting to grow in your uterus until you are about 9 months pregnant. The world around you changes from your parents decent house to a really nice loft.

You finish cooking and as you look up, you finally notice that you are not in the same house anymore. You can't even take a full step when you notice your whole center is off and you suddenly feel a kick to the ribs and you look down to find the culprit and are shocked at what you find. You see two swollen, milk filled, DD cup breasts barely contained by a nursing bra you happen to be wearing now. Under them is an enormous pregnant belly. You slowly waddle to the nearest mirror and see that you are now Kim Caswell from the show that was on.
